thread.section_title: Adria Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (London, England) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great location
thread.title_full: Great location - Review of Adria Hotel, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Sharonlee01
title: Great location
text: This hotel is in a great location where we felt totally safe even walking the streets at midnight and relatively close to the tube station where we could easily access everywhere we wanted to go. There is no lift and a narrow staircase so carrying our heavy bags up the stairs was a bit of a hassle. We had a front room and the first few nights slept with the window open because we needed fresh air and it was a bit noisy as it is on a busy street however when we closed the window it was much quieter and we slept better. Rooms were clean and serviced daily. I would not hesitate to stay here again if I am ever lucky enough to travel to London again.
